TONE.LANGUAGE: <PRIMES TROPARION1="SAT1" Type="Normal" KONTAKION1="SAT1" Cmd="!(nday > -50 && nday < 0)"/> <PRIMES Type="Lenten" KONTAKION1="SatL" Cmd="(nday > -50 && nday < 0)" /> <TERCE TROPARION1="SAT1" Type="Normal" KONTAKION1="SAT1" Cmd="!(nday > -50 && nday < 0)"/> <SEXTE TROPARION1="SAT1" Type="Normal" KONTAKION1="SAT1" Cmd="!(nday > -50 && nday < 0)"/> <NONE TROPARION1="SAT1" Type="Normal" KONTAKION1="SAT1" Cmd="!(nday > -50 && nday < 0)"/>
